entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is the nurse who returns to Harry's bedside with a potion for dreamless sleep. She is described as 'bustling off' to her office and then returning with the potion, indicating that she is a busy but caring person.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is given the potion by Madam Pomfrey. He is described as becoming drowsy and falling asleep quickly, indicating that he is exhausted.

relationships.description: Madam Pomfrey gives the potion to Harry, who drinks it and falls asleep. This relationship is described in the text as Madam Pomfrey saying 'You'll need to drink all of this, Harry'.
